original_text: But Jesus did not let him do this. Jesus said to him, ‘Go to your home and to your friends. Tell them what the Lord has done for you. Tell them how he has been kind to you.’
korean_text: 허락하지 아니하시고 그에게 이르시되 집으로 돌아가 주께서 네게 어떻게 큰 일을 행하사 너를 불쌍히 여기신 것을 네 가족에게 알리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: But Jesus did not let him do this.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 예수님은 그가 그렇게 하는 것을 허락하지 않으셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Tell them what the Lord has done for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너를 위해 행하신 일을 그들에게 말하거라.

sentences.original_text: Tell them how he has been kind to you.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너에게 어떻게 친절하셨는지를 그들에게 말하거라.'
